_attachments.dc2dc427a9a4555c03ab29b88d7b5b5a97b540d9:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Demo</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/BE9432C5-4492-4AC2-AAB8-F1F88761AC45" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Demo">
					<name/>
					<age/>
					<gender/>
					<confirm/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind nodeset="/data/name" type="xsd:string"/>
			<bind nodeset="/data/age" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 0 and . < 120" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('age-constraintMsg')"/>
			<bind nodeset="/data/gender"/>
			<bind nodeset="/data/confirm"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="name-label">
						<value>what is your name?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="age-label">
						<value>how old are you, <output ref="/data/name"/>?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-label">
						<value>what is your gender?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-m-label">
						<value>male</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-f-label">
						<value>female</value>
					</text>
					<text id="age-constraintMsg">
						<value>age must be a positive number smaller than 120</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm-label">
						<value>thanks for submitting!</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="es">
					<text id="name-label">
						<value>cómo te llamas?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="age-label">
						<value>cuántos años tiene, <output ref="/data/name"/>?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-label">
						<value>cuál es su género?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-m-label">
						<value>masculino</value>
					</text>
					<text id="gender-f-label">
						<value>femenino</value>
					</text>
					<text id="age-constraintMsg">
						<value>age must be a positive number smaller than 120</value>
					</text>
					<text id="confirm-label">
						<value>gracias!</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input ref="/data/name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('name-label')"/>
		</input>
		<input ref="/data/age">
			<label ref="jr:itext('age-label')"/>
		</input>
		<select1 ref="/data/gender">
			<label ref="jr:itext('gender-label')"/>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('gender-m-label')"/>
				<value>m</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('gender-f-label')"/>
				<value>f</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<trigger ref="/data/confirm">
			<label ref="jr:itext('confirm-label')"/>
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
